name: person-service-integration-tests
description: Integration test suite for Person Service using Testcontainers

scripts.test:coverage: npm test && cd ../source/app && go test -coverprofile=../../specs/coverage/unit.out ./... && go tool covdata textfmt -i=../../specs/coverage/go-data -o ../../specs/coverage/int.out && cp ../../specs/coverage/int.out ../../specs/coverage/coverage.out && grep -v 'mode:' ../../specs/coverage/unit.out >> ../../specs/coverage/coverage.out && go tool cover -func=../../specs/coverage/coverage.out > ../../specs/coverage/func.txt && go tool cover -html=../../specs/coverage/coverage.out -o ../../specs/coverage/report.html && cd ../../specs && node setup/parse-coverage.js coverage/func.txt coverage/coverage.json && echo 'Combined coverage reports generated in coverage/'
